```{r}
tre.1 <-"((((A,B),(C,D)),E),F);"
```
```{r}
tre1.phy <-read.tree(text=tre.1)
```
first, plot rooted
```{r}
plot(tre1.phy,type="cladogram",no.margin=TRUE)

```
Then unrooted
```{r}
plot(tre1.phy,type="unrooted",no.margin=TRUE)

```
Try rerooting
```{r}
tre.2 <-root(tre1.phy,1,resolve.root=TRUE)
plot(tre.2,type="c")

```
